title: Flag of Sweden
cardDescription: The flag of Sweden is a Scandinavian cross that extends to the edges of the flag.
description: The flag of Sweden is a Scandinavian cross that extends to the edges of the flag. The design and colors of the Swedish flag are believed to have been inspired by the present Coat of arms of Sweden of 1442, which is blue divided quarterly by a cross patt√©e of gold.

content: Proportion:
Finished size:
Hook size:
16cm x 10cm
3,5 mm
Yarn:
Blue (as A)
Yellow (as B)
/crochet-pattern-images/european-flags/flag-of-sweden.png

content.content: This pattern is worked horizontally starting from the middle and doing top and bottom parts separately. Also note that the starting chain is counted as row 1.

content: With B, ch 30
Sc 2nd ch from hook and each sc across, turn
Ch 1, sc 8, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 16, turn
Ch 1, sc 15, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 9, turn
Ch 1, sc 8, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 16, turn
Ch 1, sc 15, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 9, turn
Ch 1, sc 8, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 16, turn
Ch 1, sc 15, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 9, turn
Ch 1, sc 8, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 16, fasten off
attach B to first ch row 1, ch 1, sc 29, turn
Ch 1, sc 28, sba, turn
Ch 1, sc 15, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 9, turn
Ch 1, sc 8, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 16, turn
Ch 1, sc 15, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 9, turn
Ch 1, sc 8, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 16, turn
Ch 1, sc 15, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 9, turn
Ch 1, sc 8, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 16, turn
Ch 1, sc 15, sab, sc 3, sba, sc 9, turn
